propSpec.name: active
propSpec.desc: Indicates that a tab is currently active and its contents can be viewed

propSpec.name: activeTab
propSpec.desc: The ID of the active tab

propSpec.name: hideSingle
propSpec.desc: When true, the tab container will hide tab buttons when there is only one tab

propSpec.name: handlerOnCloseTab
propSpec.desc: The handler function to be executed when the tab is closed

propSpec.name: hasCloseOption
propSpec.desc: When true, the user can close the tab

propSpec.name: prpsTabButton
propSpec.desc: Override properties for the buttons that are rendered for both inactive and active tabs

propSpec.name: prpsTabButtonActive
propSpec.desc: Override properties for the buttons that are rendered for the active tab
